siteMetadata.title: Maggie Appleton
siteMetadata.description: Maggie Appleton is an art director and anthropological designer. This is her digital garden for growing visual explanations about technology, culture, and programming

childMdx.excerpt: Last year the  React  team released a feature called "hooks" that lets you do some powerful stuff we couldn't do as easily before... Managing state. Accessing DOM elements. Using side effects. It's fair to say the React community had a collective melt-down over this. For the…

Illustrated notes I made while working through  Chris Achard 's  Fix Common Git Mistakes  course on egghead. Want more illustrated notes on web development? Take a look at  Building Custom React Hooks ,  What the Fork is Rust?  or find out  How Are Compilers & Transpilers…

The  Rust programming language  keeps winning the middle-school popularity contest of the developer world: "most loved" on  Stack Overflow surveys . So, what's this Rust thing and why is everyone enamoured? Let's explore... This happy balance Rust manages to strike – between…
